key_phrases: subsidized network of rehearsal studios, gallery spaces, and multipurpose venues
empower more artists and organizations to create and share their work without financial strain
workshops on topics like grant writing, marketing, budgeting, and intellectual property
invaluable especially for artists and cultural leaders who are self-taught or operating without institutional backing
residency programs that bring together artists, organizers, educators, and technologists
hosted outside of the central city core
year-long funding cohorts that combine financial support with mentorship, visibility, and community building
especially for underrepresented artists and small orgs
barriers_identified: limited access to professional development for self-taught artists
centralization of opportunities in the city core
solutions_proposed: create a subsidized network of rehearsal studios, gallery spaces, and multipurpose venues
offer workshops on grant writing, marketing, budgeting, and intellectual property
establish residency programs for cross-sector collaboration on community-centered projects outside the city core
pilot year-long funding cohorts with financial support, mentorship, visibility, and community building for underrepresented artists and small organizations
